name: Jeffrey's Tower
description:
Controls: WASD / Arrow keys: Switch gravity | R: Restart | Space: Quickly go to next level | Escape: Exit level

Goal: Get Jeffrey to the exit

This is a short gravity-switching puzzle game. This is a remake of the very first game I ever made, back in 2018, repurposed as the final project in my game design class in high school.

There's a barely visible button on the bottom left of the main menu. Click it ten times to reset your progress if you feel so inclined.
